import axios from 'axios' import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' export default function CrearGestor() { const [form, setForm] = useState({rolId: 2}) const sedes = useSele const history = useHistory() const handleChange = (e) => { console.log(form) setForm({...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('/api/users/create', form) .then(res => res.data) .then(() => history.push('/admin-usuarios')) } return (

Crear Gestor

) }
